title: [Large-Scale] Mobile-Based Differentiated Mathematics Instruction for Job Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and ability to interpret job-related data
context.additional_context: Customized math learning program for professionals with only smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can select and apply differentiated learning strategies to solve job-related mathematical problems
Learners enhance problem-solving skills by 20% by utilizing diverse learning materials (text/video/interactive content) provided in mobile environments

Learners must select one applicable mathematical modeling technique (linear programming or simulation) for the HR field (optimizing workforce allocation or budget planning) within one week, build a model using the provided real-world dataset, and submit a 5-page report (including introduction, methodology, results, conclusion, and references). They must achieve at least 3 points (out of 5) in four or more of the five rubric criteria: topic relevance, data utilization, model accuracy, result interpretation, and report completeness.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
